howItWorks.question: How does Estyi work?
howItWorks.answer: Estyi connects people seeking change with certified clinics worldwide for aesthetic treatment requests. Clinics send offers.

pricing.question: Is the service paid?
pricing.answer: No, the Estyi platform is completely free for patients. You only pay treatment costs to clinics.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafety.answer: Yes, all your data is stored encrypted and is GDPR compliant. Your personal information is safely protected.

countries.question: Which countries do you serve?
countries.answer: We serve in Turkey, South Korea, Thailand, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, Poland, Czech Republic, India and Dubai.

clinicSelection.question: How is clinic selection made?
clinicSelection.answer: All our clinics are certified and accredited. You can review clinic profiles and read their reviews.

payment.question: How is payment made?
payment.answer: Payments are made directly to the clinic. Users do not make any payment through the platform.

faq.contactDescription: You can contact us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Shaping the future of aesthetic medicine
aboutUs.description: Estyi is an innovative platform that connects patients seeking aesthetic treatment worldwide with trusted clinics. We are shaping the future of aesthetic medicine with our approach focused on transparency, security, and quality.

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing
transparent.description: We offer clear prices without hidden costs. Know the treatment costs in advance.

global.title: Global Access
global.description: We provide access to certified clinics worldwide. Discover the best treatment options.

ai.title: AI-Powered Matching
ai.description: We match clinics with patients using artificial intelligence. Personalized recommendations.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: All our clinics undergo license and certificate verification. Only clinics that meet the highest quality standards are featured on our platform. The safety and satisfaction of our patients is our top priority.

cta.title: Get In Touch With Us
cta.description: You can contact us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

legal.medicalDisclaimer: Estyi does not provide medical advice or medical services. Quotes are provided by clinics. In emergencies, contact local emergency services.
legal.noticeAtCollectionIntro: This notice summarizes how Estyi collects and uses your personal and sensitive data. Please read before signing up or creating a request.
legal.consentIntro: Your explicit consent is required for the processing of your sensitive and health-related data (request details, photos, etc.) with matched clinics solely for obtaining quotes and communication.
legal.clinicAgreementIntro: As a clinic you must accept the Clinic Provider Agreement before activating your profile and sending offers. It includes licensing warranty, compliance obligations, Estyi is not a provider, indemnity, 24h SLA rule, and USD pricing obligations.
legal.dataSecurityAddendumIntro: Clinics may use user data only for quote and communication purposes; no resale. Security measures and retention/deletion policies apply.
legal.dmcaIntro: DMCA compliance. Designated agent details for copyright infringement notices [placeholder].
legal.medicalDisclaimerIntro: Estyi is not a healthcare provider and does not provide medical advice or medical services. All quotes are provided by clinics. In emergencies, contact local emergency services.

full.pageSubtitle: All legal documents in one place: user and clinic obligations.
full.lastUpdated: Last updated: February 2026. Estyi is a US-based technology intermediary platform; it is not a healthcare provider.
full.termsContent:
By using the Estyi platform you agree to the following terms.

Estyi is an intermediary technology platform that matches aesthetic treatment requests with certified clinics. Estyi is not a healthcare provider and does not provide medical advice or medical services. All quotes and medical information are provided by clinics.

The service is provided "as is." To the maximum extent permitted by law, Estyi is not liable for treatment outcomes, clinic practices, or third-party conduct. Disputes are subject to mediation first, then courts as applicable; arbitration and class-action waiver may apply per US standards.
full.privacyContent:
Your personal data (email, contact details, request details, photos) is stored with secure encryption and used only for service delivery, matching, and legal obligations.

Your data is shared only with matched and approved clinics for the purpose of obtaining quotes and communication; no marketing or sale to third parties. Retention and deletion policies comply with applicable law. Your rights of access, objection, and data portability are preserved.
full.noticeAtCollectionContent:
Before you sign up or create a request, you should know what data we collect.

We collect: identity and contact information, request details (procedure type, country/city preferences, age, gender), and if provided, photos and notes. This data is processed to obtain quotes, match you with clinics, and communicate. Legal basis and retention periods are set out in the Privacy Policy.
full.consentContent:
Your explicit consent is required for the processing of your sensitive and health-related data (request details, photos, notes).

By agreeing, you expressly consent to the processing and sharing of this data with matched clinics solely for the purpose of providing you with quotes and communication. You may withdraw consent later; withdrawal will be handled in accordance with our retention policy.
full.ageGateContent: Estyi services are for users aged 18 and over. By signing up or creating a request you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and accept this requirement. Consent to processing and sharing of your sensitive data is also covered under Terms & Policies. Users under 18 may not use the platform.
full.medicalDisclaimerContent:
Estyi is not a healthcare provider and does not provide medical advice or medical services.

All quotes, prices, and medical information you see on the platform are provided by clinics. You should consult a healthcare provider in person before making decisions. In emergencies, contact local emergency services.
full.clinicAgreementContent:
As a clinic you must accept this agreement before activating your profile and sending offers.

Licensing and compliance: The clinic represents that it holds valid licenses, certificates, and complies with local law. Estyi endeavours to verify this information but the ultimate responsibility lies with the clinic.

Estyi's role: Estyi is not an agent or healthcare provider; it only facilitates matching between users and clinics via technology. The clinic is responsible for treatment, pricing, and medical decisions.

Indemnity: The clinic agrees to indemnify Estyi for claims arising from use of the platform, the clinic's own practices, or breaches.

24-hour SLA: A response must be sent within 24 hours for each request, or a predefined default offer will be sent automatically. Breach of this rule may result in sanctions related to subscription and access.

Pricing: All offers are in USD. After an offer is sent for a request, the price for that request cannot be increased (price is locked).

Subscription and quota: Monthly request quotas apply according to your plan; overage may result in additional fees or restrictions.
full.dataSecurityContent:
Clinics may use user data accessed through the platform only for the purpose of providing quotes and communication.

Prohibitions: Use of user data for marketing, resale, or off-platform purposes is prohibited. Data must be processed only within the secure platform environment; unnecessary copying or sharing with third parties is prohibited.

Security: Access, encryption, and access logs are managed in accordance with applicable law. In the event of a data breach, notification and required steps will be taken in accordance with Estyi policies.

Retention and deletion: User data is retained only as long as necessary; deletion requests and retention periods are subject to the Privacy Policy and data processing agreements.

help.title: Help Center
help.description: How can we help you? You can reach us through the contact channels below.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.note: All times are shown in Turkey time (GMT+3)

items.question: How does Estyi work?
items.answer: Estyi transmits patients' aesthetic treatment requests to certified clinics worldwide. Patients share photos and information, clinics send offers.

items.question: Is the service paid?
items.answer: No, the Estyi platform is completely free for patients. You only pay treatment fees to clinics.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Yes, all your data is stored encrypted and is GDPR compliant. Your personal information is safely protected.

items.question: Which countries do you serve?
items.answer: We serve in Turkey, South Korea, Thailand, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, Poland, Czech Republic, India and Dubai.

items.question: How is clinic selection made?
items.answer: All our clinics are certified and accredited. You can review clinic profiles and read their reviews.

items.question: Is there post-treatment support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide continuous support before and after treatment. You can contact us for any questions.

items.question: How is payment made?
items.answer: Payments are made through secure payment systems. You pay according to the price you agree with the clinic.

contact.description: Contact us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.
